fragment.sub_volume_note: SCRIPTORES AETATIS INCERTAE EX ORDINE LITERARUM
fragment.author: AUTOCHARIS
fragment.text: Ὅτι (Πολύφημος ἐν Μυσίᾳ καταλειφθεὶς) τὴν Κίον ἔκτισεν, εἴρηκεν Αὐτόχαρις ἐν πρώτῳ Χρόνων.
fragment.translation: Polyphemum in Mysia relictum Cium urbem condidisse Autocharis Chronicorum libro primo.
fragment.commentary: Αὐτόχαρις] sic Eudocia p. 341, ubi eadem. Schol. Libri mass. Praebent αὐτὸ Χάρις. Cf. Nymphodori fr. 18, tom. II, p. 380.
